artificiallifefx

Class AWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • artificiallifefx.AWorld

  • public class AWorld
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the movement, food detection and entity removal as well as adding and editing entities

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AWorld.Direction
      Enumeration for all four movement directions

      • checkDead

        public void checkDead()
        Checks all entities to see if they are dead. If so, set their state to dead

      • entityStats

        public java.lang.String entityStats()
        Returns the statistics for the world. Live entities are listed in detail, food is just added in a counter
        Returns:
        the completed output string for all entities

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves all entities in the direction of the closest food entity or if no food within range, move a random direction. Also handles eating food if within range. This is run every 0.5 seconds.

      • eat

        public void eat(int i,
                AWorld.Direction d)
        Removes entity close to another entity
        Parameters:
        i - index of entity doing the eating
        d - direction to eat

      • canMove

        public int canMove(int x,
                   int y)
        Checks if an entity can move into a space
        Parameters:
        x - xpos to be moved into
        y - ypos to be moved into
        Returns:
        0 if space is empty, 1 if space is full, 2 if space is food

        Parameters:

        ypos - to return index of
        Returns:
